config.invmove.ponder.movement.holdPonde:
§6§oFull Ponder support requires Create 6.0.7+.
Some features (Hold To Ponder option) are disabled.
tooltip.config.invmove.ponder.movement.h: Controls if movement is allowed while pressing the Ponder key on an item.
tooltip.config.invmove.ponder.movement.p: This menu is a pause screen so this option may be overridden.
tooltip.config.invmove.ponder.movement.t: This menu is a pause screen so this option may be overridden.
tooltip.config.invmove.ponder.movement.i: This menu is a pause screen so this option may be overridden.
